definition: (of a mountain) high and tapered peak or summit/mountain-like in appearance/highest level/classifier for camels
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
abbr. for 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰, Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
summit/apex/pinnacle (of one's career etc)/peak (of a civilization etc)
Johnnie To (1955-), Hong Kong film director
Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
Chifeng prefecture-level city in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: There Vulcan Peak Temple, built by the Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 峰上有祝融殿，是明代所建。

sentences.english: Tsheri tried to conquer Everest last year but failed.
sentences.chinese: 伽利去年就试过要征服圣母峰，不过没有成功。

sentences.english: Through analyzing their spectrums, we find three remarkable peaks.
sentences.chinese: 从它们的频谱图上发现了三个显著的峰。

sentences.english: Feng cares less about himself than the young people of his hometown.
sentences.chinese: 比起同乡的年轻人，峰更少关心他自己。

sentences.english: Extreme formant shifting is like 1/2 speed tape , but realtime.
sentences.chinese: 偏激的共振峰偏移像半速运行的磁带，但是实时的。

sentences.english: Heat acclimatization lowered the level of the second peak, though it was remarkably prolonged.
sentences.chinese: 犬热习服后可以降低第2峰的高度并且延长其平台期。

sentences.english: The radiation response of 375 ℃ thermoluminescence(TL) peak can be changed.
sentences.chinese: 石英375℃热释光峰存在灵敏度的变化。

sentences.english: Everest Snowman foundling, blocked septic tanks.
sentences.chinese: 圣母峰雪人的弃婴，化粪池堵塞的凶手。

sentences.english: Highest point for Xianglufeng, altitude 557 metres, commonly known as " devilishly hard to achieve."
sentences.chinese: 最高点为香炉峰，海拔557米，俗称“鬼见愁”。

sentences.english: The basic characteristic of 120 ℃ thermoluminescence peak of iceland spar was studied.
sentences.chinese: 对冰洲石120℃热释光峰的基本特性进行初步研究。

sentences.english: Apply the Peak Rule only after the Peak Day is identified.
sentences.chinese: 出现排卵时即认清峰日后，才运用峰日规则。

sentences.english: Apply the Peak Rule only after the Peak Day is identified.
sentences.chinese: 出现排卵时即认清峰日后，才运用峰日规则。

sentences.english: Double-breasted suit jackets should always have peak lapels.
sentences.chinese: 双排扣男西装夹克应该是峰状翻领。

sentences.english: Ye-eah we wept, when we remembered zion.
sentences.chinese: 烨峰我们哭，当我们记住锡安。

sentences.english: Huangshan in the Jin dynasty, when Buddhism introduced, under the peak Regulus Regulus temple was built.
sentences.chinese: 佛教在晋朝时传入黄山，轩辕峰下曾建有轩­辕古刹。

sentences.english: Atypical subdiploid peak was observed by flow cytometry.
sentences.chinese: 流式细胞仪检测出现典型的亚二倍体凋亡峰。

definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Lingyun county in Baise 百色[Bai3 se4], Guangxi
